## CommandResponse class

Abstract instance of response-to-command related data.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare abstract class CommandResponse 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [\_message?](./noisecord.commandresponse._message.md) | <code>protected</code> | Message | _(Optional)_ |
|  [content](./noisecord.commandresponse.content.md) | <code>readonly</code> | string \| null | Get content of the message, if present. |
|  [embeds](./noisecord.commandresponse.embeds.md) | <code>readonly</code> | import("discord.js").Embed\[\] \| null | Get all embeds of the message, or empty array if there are none. |
|  [flags](./noisecord.commandresponse.flags.md) | <code>readonly</code> | Readonly&lt;import("discord.js").MessageFlagsBitField&gt; \| null | Get flags of the message, if present. |
